title: TBD | The Startup Delivering Adderall
description:
In just two years, the mental-health startup Cerebral has grown to operate in 50 states, registered more than 200,000 patients, and reached a $4.8 billion valuation. Has it prioritized growth over patient care?

Guest: Caleb Melby

Host: Lizzie O'Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: What happens when you pair the Silicon Valley playbook with prescription drugs?
